QuestData.Title: Royal Orders
QuestData.Description: It's time for you to leave, $n. Go to the Military District with the other civilians.$B$BCheck in with Gwen Armstead when you cross the bridge to the southeast... see if everyone's okay.$B$BI will stay here with the guards and cover the civilians' retreat.$B$BGo now. That is an order!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gwen Armstead in the Military District to the southeast.
QuestData.RewardText: We're all fine here. A little shaken... but alive.
